translation: Ese inkuru y’ikizatwikira (abantu ku munsi w’imperuka) yakugezeho?
Kuri uwo munsi, uburanga bwa bamwe buzaba busuzuguritse,
(Igihe bari ku isi) babaga bakora bashishikaye (basenga ibindi bitari Allah), (ariko ku mperuka) bazaba bananiwe (kandi bafite ikimwaro).

arabic_text: لَّيۡسَ لَهُمۡ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٖ
translation: Nta byo kurya bazaba bafite uretse ibyatsi birura kandi bifite amahwa,

arabic_text: لَّا يُسۡمِنُ وَلَا يُغۡنِي مِن جُوعٖ
translation: (Ibyo byo kurya) ntibizigera bibabyibushya cyangwa ngo bibamare inzara.
Kuri uwo munsi kandi (ubundi) buranga buzaba bukeye;
(Ba nyirabwo bazaba bari) mu Ijuru ry’ikirenga,

arabic_text: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡإِبِلِ كَيۡفَ خُلِقَتۡ

translation: Bityo, (yewe Muhamadi) bibutse kuko mu by’ukuri wowe uri uwibutsa,
Mu by’ukuri iwacu ni ho garukiro ryabo,
Hanyuma mu by’ukuri ni twe tuzabakorera ibarura
